item.title: 039-20231206-DestroyedPhandalalin
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log I head over to the Lord’s Alliance. It looks hastily abandoned but there’s a note the Note says if there are any survivors to head to the safe location in the woods.

item.title: 030-20230711-Escape_attempt
item.description: Session Summary After finding our gear, we can’t help but head back and check out the hidden passage. We eventually find a room that looks like the #black_spyder main office and sleeping area.

item.title: 025-20230405-FightWithGuild
item.description: Session Summary We kill all of the guild people except for one bureaucrat who runs into the cave. We learn that the mine has been nearly exhausted, so the miners guild decided it wasn’t worth rescuing the miners.

item.title: 024-20230329-SearchingForGoblins
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session Log Identified Loot Circulet if vines turn into a tree for 10 hr.

item.title: 013-20221116-PostBreak
item.description: Session Summary Recap of Last Session We fight the owner of the bar #Marys and her hoodlums. we beat up her hoods and capture her with the silencing amulet We level up
